rules_text:
Trample
When Seismic Chimera enters, bless target creature. [i](Create a token copy of this creature’s blessing attached to that permanent.)[/i]
rules_text2:
[i](You may also cast this side from your hand.)[/i]
Enchant creature
As long as you control enchanted creature, it gets +2/+2.
Enchanted creature can’t block.
